vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπάνωθεν
or ἐπάντλ-ωθε, adverb above, on top, κούφα σοι χθὼν ἐπάνωθε πέσοι [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 up country, inland, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II of Time, of old, χαῶν τῶν ἐ. probably in [Refs 3rd c.BC+]; ἐν τοῖς ἐ. in former times, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: about; above; from a former; inland; on top
vocabInfos.mediumDef: about; above; from a former; inland; on top
